item.description: The U.S. State Department said Saturday that it has "credible reports" that Hamas could violate the ceasefire with an attack on Palestinian civilians ...

item.title: 'No Kings' protests against Trump bring a street party vibe to cities nationwide
item.description: People gathered Saturday in cities and communities across the U.S. on Saturday for "No Kings" demonstrations against President Donald Trump.

item.title: Trump commutes prison sentence of ex-GOP Rep. George Santos
item.description: Trump said he began thinking about Santos after being reminded of a controversy about Democratic Sen. Richard Blumenthal's military service claims.
